alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Garden (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 25 at 2:31AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Garden and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be dangerous to nearly impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, including whiteout conditions at times. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information. A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely dangerous. Do not travel. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
